Room.Name: Ladies Walk
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Ladies Walk, near the eastern end of the wide tunnel.
Room.LongDescription: The Ladies Walk continues to the west from here. A hallway runs north and south, giving you a choice of directions. The hallway is lighted with heavy candles high on the wall every few meters, but appears to fade away in the distance at either end. Oaken doors are closed along the hallway, but a few have light coming from under them.
